sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-card>
        <el-row :gutter="20" class="top">
            <el-button type="primary" :icon="DocumentAdd" @click="handleAddDialog()">添加题目类型</el-button>
        </el-row>
        <el-table :data="tableData" stripe style="width: 50%">
            <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="100" />
            <el-table-column prop="cateName" label="题目类型" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="action" label="操作" width="200" fixed="right">
                <template v-slot="scope">
                    <el-button type="primary" :icon="Edit"
                               @click="handleEditDialog(scope.row.id)">
                    </el-button>
                    <el-button type="danger" :icon="Delete" disabled
                               @click="">
                    </el-button>
                </template>
            </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
    </el-card>
    <AddDialog v-model="dialogVisible"
            :dialogVisible="dialogVisible"
            :dialog-title="dialogTitle"
            @initList="initList"
    ></AddDialog>
    <EditDialog v-model="dialogVisible"
               :id="cateId"
               :dialogVisible="dialogVisible"
               :dialog-title="dialogTitle"
               @initList="initList"
    ></EditDialog>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
import axios from '@/util/axios';
import {DocumentAdd, Edit, Delete} from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
import AddDialog from "@/views/category/components/add";
import EditDialog from "@/views/category/components/add";

const tableData = ref([]);
const dialogVisible = ref(false);
const dialogVisible2 = ref(false);
const dialogTitle = ref('');
const cateId = ref(-1);

const initList = async () => {
    const res = await axios.get('/api/survey-cate/all');
    console.log(res)
    tableData.value = res.data.data.surveyCates;
}
initList();
const handleAddDialog = () => {
    dialogVisible.value = true;
}
const handleEditDialog = (id) => {
    cateId.value = id;
    dialogVisible2.value = true;
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.top {
  padding-bottom: 30px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
</style>
